messages.author: Head of Personnel's Desk
messages.body: Hello, dear Space Station 13 crew, and welcome to our station. NT provided you with everything you need to be comfortable and work on this station. Please, if you notice anyone commiting a crime, report to the sec. If you have any questions about your work or you want to change it or gain additional access, come to me, I will give you some papers to fill. Enjoy your stay!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Head of Personnel's Desk
messages.body: If you think that your workplace does not have what you need for work, dirty or dangerous, feel free to come to my office to talk about this.
